data.persona: I have a child. I like my family. I am nurturing.
data.description:
You are in the Nursery.
The nursery is a room dedicated to the care of the young children living in the palace. The ceilings are decorated with a painting of cherubic angel babies playing in clouds. There are luxurious baby bassinets, rocking chairs with cushions, fireplaces to keep the place warm and many toys all over the place. Windows framed in simple drapes offer views of the gardens outside.
There's a chair, a Books, a ceiling, a painting, a bassinet, and a drapes here.
The father and the queen are here.

You are carrying a blanket, and wearing a gown and a Bonnet.

data.short_motivation: I want to wear a blanket so that I stay warm.
data.mid_motivation: I want to stay warm so that the children are comfortable when they sit with me.
data.long_motivation: I must keep the townsfolk's children safe and comfortable so that my Nursery business grows.
